sourcesContent:
import { ChatIcon } from '@chakra-ui/icons'
import { Button, Text, Heading, Divider, HStack, Tab, TabList, VStack } from '@chakra-ui/react'
import React from 'react'

const Sidebar = () => {
  return (
    <VStack py="1.4rem">
        <HStack justify="space-evenly" w="100%">
            <Heading size="md">
                Add Friend
            </Heading>
            <Button>
                <ChatIcon/>
            </Button>
        </HStack>
        <Divider/>
        <VStack as={TabList}>
            <HStack as={Tab}>
                <Text>John Smith</Text>
            </HStack>
            <HStack as={Tab}>
                <Text>John Smith</Text>
            </HStack>
        </VStack>
    </VStack>
  )
}

export default Sidebar
